data.card_desc: You'll love this new, budget chicken dish. Any leftovers freeze well and make a handy lunch.
Evoke the Middle East with our veggie harissa cauliflower pilaf with a heady combination of fruit, nuts and spice. Cook it in the oven for lovely fluffy rice
Dig out the slow cooker to make this stew. Topped with toasted pine nuts and served with flatbreads, it makes a healthy and nutritious vegan meal

data.card_title: Honey & orange roast sea bass with lentils
data.card_desc: Liven up your midweek meals with this low-calorie, gluten-free fish supper - ready in under half an hour

data.card_title: Pot-roast loin of pork in cider with celeriac
data.card_desc: Roast a loin of pork with smoked bacon lardons, shallots, celeriac and thyme for a hearty Sunday lunch that the whole family will love
Try this brilliant Egyptian recipe from the head chef of London restaurant Ombra. Made using fava beans, it’s mashed into a chunky purée along with garlic, lemon and tahini
A warming bowl of this comforting vegan sausage casserole is the perfect antidote to chilly nights. This easy family dinner is great for feeding a crowd
The fish doesn't need to marinate for long to take on all the Moroccan flavours in this dish
This flavoursome, low-fat chicken casserole is easy to make and freezes really well, so why not make double and freeze for speedy midweek meals

data.card_title: Butter bean, chorizo & spinach baked eggs
data.card_desc: This budget-friendly, midweek meal is simple, satisfying and made in one pan. Less washing up, more flavour!

data.card_title: Vegan lentil & sweet potato cottage pie
data.card_desc: Serve your family our hearty meat-free pie for dinner. The rich umami sauce is made with soy and mustard powder, and pumpkin seeds add a good crunch
This Italian-style casserole will warm you up, and it's great value too
Hit your 5-a-day target in one go with this crisp pizza piled high with veg, suitable for the lactose-intolerant

data.card_title: Quinoa stew with squash, prunes & pomegranate
data.card_desc: Get a dose of iron and protein from this healthy, squash casserole that's full of texture and flavour
This succulent and superhealthy one-pot is guaranteed to satisfy a crowd - save time and make it up to two days ahead
Steam sustainable fish like tilapia in foil parcels with curry paste, coconut and lime then serve with rice for a healthy supper

data.card_title: Zesty lamb chops with crushed kidney beans
data.card_desc: Perk up lamb chops with lemon zest, then serve with mashed red beans with chilli and garlic for a speedy weeknight supper
This fragrant Thai dish is sure to get your taste buds into action, and is ready in under an hour

data.card_title: Jerk-seasoned pork & pineapple skewers with black beans & rice
data.card_desc: Pop these healthy kebabs on a griddle or the BBQ – they're packed with Creole spices and are a lean treat
A lighter version of the Indian takeaway classic from Angela Nilsen, this tomato-based curry is packed with extra spinach and peppers
A veggie dinner party dish which stands alone as a vegan main course or as a complex side dish perfect served with spiced roast meat or fish.

data.card_title: Spicy seafood stew with tomatoes & lime
data.card_desc: John Torode's Mexican-inspired one-pot casserole is packed with shellfish, white fish and plenty of chilli
Looking for a vegan burger with bite and bags of flavour? Look no further – we’re confident that meat-eaters, veggies and vegans alike will love this beetroot burger recipe
A low-fat, low-calorie stir-fry of pork and prawns, flavoured with teriyaki, madras and five-spice powder
